Title: Development of Robust Quantitative Structure-Activity Relationship Models for CYP2D6 Catalysis and Inhibition
Description: Analysis of metabolic stability, determining the inhibition of CYP450 activity and whether the compounds are a substrate for the CYP450 enzyme using specifically CYP2D6. The data to build these models is publicly available at PubChem, AID1645840, AID1645841, AID1645842
Interpretation: Probability of inhibiting the enzyme and probability of being a ubstrate of the enzyme. Activity in both indicates the compound is a ligand of the enzyme.
